roleset.name: register officially in advance

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Regulators insisted that franchisers pre-register such changes with the state.

example.name: All args
example.text: All exporters must produce entry forms proving they pre-registered with the FDA for importing food products into the U.S.
example.arg: for importing food products into the U.S.

example.name: As phrase arg3
example.text: t is much better to carry a document on your person and to be pre-registered with the state as a donor.

roleset.note: PREREGISTER-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to register.02. (from preregister.01-v)
